On Wed, 28 Jan 2004, Michael Stack wrote:

|(Maybe someone killed the db -- it don't seem to be running and I don't 
|see an init script for it.  Is that it under /usr/local?  Is there doc. 
|on how this stuff is supposed to be set up and run?).

It looks like the machine must have restarted.  I see postgres is running 
now, but it isn't set to start when the machien boots.  I'll send Joerg 
another email about this.

The documentation is really minimal, but it's there in CVS I believe.  
I'll try to put in a few hours this weekend fixing the bugs you mentioned 
previously and beefing up the documentation.

Thanks,

pt.
